summary: •Over 10 and half years of IT/consulting experience in Analysis, Design, and Implementation of Oracle ERP Applications out of which about 12 years of experience as a Techno-Functional Consultant primarily in the areas of Manufacturing (Plan to Manufacture ( PTM), Order to Cash(OTC), Procure to Pay(PTP), Supply Chain Management(SCM) ) Highly motivated, enthusiastic professional with a high degree of commitment to succeed. Worked in different capacities in the area of designing, coding, documentation and implementation of projects using Oracle EBS 11i and  Oracle EBS R12.Oracle Applications Expertise:•	Hands-on experience in design, implementation, development, customization and enhancement of Oracle Applications R12, 11.5.10 and 11.5.9, Well versed in preparation of functional design documents, technical design documents, user training, and post go-live support. Some of the modules worked are listed below :-	Procure to Pay ( PTP), Order to Cash (OTC), Plan to Manufacture ( PTM), Inventory (INV), Costing (CST), Bills of Material (BOM), Routing, MSCA ( Mobile Supply Chain Applications), Warehouse Management Systems (WMS), Order Management (OM), Sales Order, Advance Pricing, Purchasing (PO), , Account Receivables (AR), Account Payables (AP),  General Ledger(GL), CRM (Install Base, Service contracts), HRMS, Application Object Library (AOL), System Administration etc.•	Experience working as a Functional consultant, Techno Functional consultant and Lead and have managed a team size of upto 8-10 people. Experience handling project technically and functionally. Worked in over 6 implementation projects.•	Developed several reports using BI (XML) Publisher, Oracle Reports, PL/SQL and Discoverer.•	Experience in migration of data from Legacy Systems to Oracle Applications.•
